parameters.name: AllowPct
parameters.description: The percentage of requests that are allowed to be redirected to the origin server. Valid values: **0** to **100**.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name.

parameters.name: GapTime
parameters.description: The length of waiting time to skip after an exit from the queue. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: MaxTimeWait
parameters.description: The maximum length of waiting time in the queue. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: WaitUri
parameters.description: The regular expression that is used to match URI strings for which the virtual waiting room feature is enabled.

parameters.name: WaitUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the waiting page.
